lead_paragraph: HENDRICKS--Carmen Ortiz. The faculty and staff of the Silberman School of Social Work at Hunter College are profoundly saddened by the untimely loss of our good friend and distinguished colleague, Carmen Ortiz Hendricks. A member of our faculty for more than 20 years, Dr. Hendricks was a gifted teacher, skilled administrator, and nationally renowned scholar. Her seminal research and publication in the area of cultural competence won widespread recognition, and her collaborative persona made her a sought after leader in our profession. We all mourn her loss and will treasure her memory. Mary M. Cavanaugh, Acting Dean, Silberman School of Social Work at Hunter College 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HENDRICKS, CARMEN ORTIZ
